subskills.DESCRIPTION: Predict and test whether objects will sink or float in water
Sort objects based on whether they can be moved by wind/air
Demonstrate how to make objects stop moving using different methods
Create a simple ramp and predict how objects will move down it
Compare how objects move on different surfaces (smooth, rough, bumpy)
Demonstrate how magnets can move objects without touching them
Sort objects by whether they roll in straight or curved paths
Identify which objects bounce and explain why they think some don't
Demonstrate how to make objects spin using different methods
Compare how objects move in water versus on land
Create a simple pendulum and observe its back-and-forth motion
Design a way to move objects across a table without touching them
